snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown signed legislation on Tuesday overhauling the state’s management of its groundwater supply, bringing it in line with other states that have long regulated their wells.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown signed legislation on Tuesday overhauling the state’s management of its groundwater supply, bringing it in line with other states that have long regulated their wells.

headline.main: California: Measure to Overhaul Water Management
headline.print_headline: California: Measure To Overhaul Water Management
